comments:
Description:
 When using Apatch Tomcat v5.5 and trying to detect the implementation  
 information for Apatch Tomcat v5.5, then the unexpected error occurred. 
 I'm not sure if this Java errors are harmful to this web project or not, 
 but I believe this kind of exception should be avoided anyway. 

Build date: wtp-sdk-S-1.5M5-200603022222.zip

OS:?Windows XP Japanese SP2
    Java 1.5 (J2RE 1.5.0 IBM Windows 32 build pwi32devifx-20060124)
    Apatch Tomcat v5.5.15

Steps to recreate problem:
 1- Install Apatch Tomcat 5.5 on my PC
 2- Install Server runtime environment on Preference panel
 3- Create a new Dynamic Web Project 
    (File -> New -> Project : Web -> Dynamic Web Project)
 4- On "New Dynamic Web Project" wizard, put project name and click next
    to go to "Select Page Facets" panel
 5- Click "Show Runtimes" to add Runtime information in this panel.
 6- From "Runtimes" list, select "Apache Tomcat v5.5"
    Then, the following Exception appeared: 

====================================================================
!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 2 1 2006-03-13 21:55:47.633
!MESSAGE NLS missing message: doesNotImplement in: org.eclipse.wst.common.projec
t.facet.core.internal.FacetCorePlugin

Expected output : 
No Java exception by the operation on "New Dynamic Web Project" wizard"

Created an attachment (id=36132)
Error log for this problem

Error log recorded for this problem

Created an attachment (id=36134)
Error log for this problem

Error log recorded for this problem

Created an attachment (id=36135)
Screen capture to explain the operation

Screen capture to explain the operation to reproduce this problem.

This is a problem with the runtime label providers registered in the server tools plugins. This used to work, but doesn't any more. My guess is that some changes was made in how things are packaged or plugin dependencies to break this.

This problem is no longer recreatable with the latest code. 
(Verified this worked with Eclipse 3.2 M6 I20060401)

The problem is no longer recreatable with Eclipse 3.2 I20060401
Thank you very much!
